creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
inscription: Inscription UL: 倒騎東??是狂(?生)?不放貞西(去?)恩報徳???欽仰當年法力房
life_date: Hirano Gogaku, Japanese, 1809–1893; Hoashi Kyōu, Japanese, 1810–1884
markings: R side of upper dowel, when rolled, in pen: [Kyou Monk]; URQ, borderless relief seal; L edge, just above center:知雨; square intaglio:岳字五岳; L edge center square, borderless relief: 古竹園主; LRQ, small square relief:致大
medium: Hanging scroll, ink and color on paper
signed: UL: 古(竹?)??岳 LRQ: 杏雨?颿足寫
title: Monk Riding Backwards
